lookList.content: 这个垫子真的没有让我失望！！！因为我是娘家和自己家来回跑，垫子不好带，就想着要不不买算了～结果我看到一个儿科医生讲，爬行有多少多少好处之类的话，果断查起资料来～👍我是做了很多功课的，查了很多资料，对比🆚了很多爬行垫选了这款，第一☝️，要无毒无害无气味🈚️！第二☝️，要厚度，不能太薄，否则孩子跌倒会很疼😂！第三☝️，就是价格啦，要实惠！这个价格是符合我所有要求的基础上，还适中的一个价格！反正真的是很开心啦～不是托，只是一个对宝宝事物比较紧张的麻麻～表白网易严选❤️

lookList.content: 南瓜色真的很好看，显白，严选的东西真给力
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/d29c73a49b6d53dc9a67bdd0d974b7af.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":750,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":1487016,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/eb50f591573e87ab5a9a622b676e1510.png","itemName":"小方盖系列 水性可撕指甲油","positionRight":true,"top":648,"left":284,"price":14.9,"itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"健康不伤甲，告别乏味跃然指尖","tagName":"小方盖系列 水性可撕指甲油","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/d29c73a49b6d53dc9a67bdd0d974b7af.jpg","height":1000}

lookList.content: 二十年没玩指甲油了，看到有无味可剥指甲油，买来玩玩。真的没有刺激性味道！不习惯涂指甲油的我，其实涂了无色底油就够了，我觉得。南瓜色很红，不知为啥叫南瓜色，世上有红色的南瓜我没吃过的？！裸色有点让我失望，本来想买个低调色的，谁知……所以我宁愿高调点涂南瓜色了～后来撕下来，有点伤指甲，建议尽量别强制撕。能持续至少一周吧。

lookList.content: 天气越来越冷了放办公室里盖，不要问毯子在哪里，当被背景布啦哈哈哈哈
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/6e530680d7eb298c929e73443fdccd81.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":1000,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":1216003,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/1865a98f15a134e5db9099640481c123.png","itemName":"新色 轻便保暖办公居家多用绒毯","positionRight":false,"top":494,"left":272,"price":19,"itemStatus":2,"position":1,"itemDesc":"空调房必备，轻巧耐用","tagName":"新色 轻便保暖办公居家多用绒毯","cart":false},{"itemId":1039035,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/6fc6590e5a50192237cbde7a341492c6.png","itemName":"冻干蜂蜜柠檬片 60克","positionRight":false,"top":82,"left":428,"price":25,"itemStatus":2,"position":1,"itemDesc":"微酸果蜜，清心润心","tagName":"冻干蜂蜜柠檬片 60克","cart":false},{"itemId":1136015,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/1bb3152a559b86298cd729a2d8e44afc.png","itemName":"开口甘栗 100克","positionRight":false,"top":280,"left":396,"price":9,"itemStatus":2,"position":1,"itemDesc":"开口易剥，甜香绵软","tagName":"开口甘栗 100克","cart":false},{"itemId":1108028,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/384c689de50380bbd5094d3c51e9a688.png","itemName":"鲜果冻 ","positionRight":true,"top":196,"left":94,"price":14,"itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"果冻里面有真果粒","tagName":"鲜果冻 ","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/6e530680d7eb298c929e73443fdccd81.jpg","height":750}

lookList.content:
发货很迅速，美味又便捷的西式早餐，微波炉一分钟搞定，女儿和老公都很喜欢吃，简直是早餐救星！ 
本来觉得一箱15个有点多，还担心冰箱放不下，但是今天一家人就吃掉5个，明后天的早饭继续！ 希望严选还可以再上一些其他的口味，我们一家都是吃货
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"http://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/7e1b5949d900980a35f7fdcb60dbe5c9.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":750,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":3397011,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/7ec6491c56c5bdf0c01b7145a42bcadf.png","itemName":"培根帕尼尼100g*15袋","positionRight":true,"top":384,"left":388,"price":128,"itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"加热即食，鲜香培根","tagName":"培根帕尼尼100g*15袋","cart":false}],"url":"http://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/7e1b5949d900980a35f7fdcb60dbe5c9.jpg","height":750}

lookList.content: 非常好喝，赶上福利价真的很划算。推荐
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/55965a7db2fb3d323b0b37408125af4e.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":1000,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":1522021,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/fe618606667ba967fb49a8b9becedf8c.png","itemName":"冰滴拿铁咖啡饮料 250毫升*4罐","positionRight":true,"top":460,"left":364,"price":40,"itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"香浓拿铁，品质生活","tagName":"冰滴拿铁咖啡饮料 250毫升*4罐","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/55965a7db2fb3d323b0b37408125af4e.jpg","height":1000}

lookList.content: 好喝，味道不错，就是喝了失眠了
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/607e3a8c4befc744f12450b83ba44490.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":1000,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":1522021,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/fe618606667ba967fb49a8b9becedf8c.png","itemName":"冰滴拿铁咖啡饮料 250毫升*4罐","positionRight":true,"top":324,"left":270,"price":40,"itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"香浓拿铁，品质生活","tagName":"冰滴拿铁咖啡饮料 250毫升*4罐","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/607e3a8c4befc744f12450b83ba44490.jpg","height":750}

lookList.content: 超好吃 日期很新哈哈哈哈哈哈
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/2ae75b3838cb9bd899a644fc188d5c57.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":640,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":1156184,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/485290a0e8f0faa28b5e426c4307feaf.png","itemName":"奶萨酥 35克*6包","positionRight":false,"top":208,"left":654,"price":16,"itemStatus":2,"position":1,"itemDesc":"烤芙条妙搭牛轧糖","tagName":"奶萨酥 35克*6包","cart":false},{"itemId":1434007,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/be2345b01aabb31340f903aac9083c66.png","itemName":"切达奶酪曲奇 180克","positionRight":true,"top":472,"left":166,"price":19,"itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"进口安佳黄油，咸香酥脆","tagName":"切达奶酪曲奇 180克","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/2ae75b3838cb9bd899a644fc188d5c57.jpg","height":640}

lookList.content: 小米南瓜粥，好吃还好看
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/2e5ac4861a43e5b655af679a56a9ba29.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":1000,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":1135077,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/6300a31c393c84ab4373bd8cd52535bf.png","itemName":"黄小米 480克","positionRight":true,"top":388,"left":512,"price":19,"itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"赤峰好谷，米香浓郁","tagName":"黄小米 480克","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/2e5ac4861a43e5b655af679a56a9ba29.jpg","height":750}

lookList.content: 很赞～～～
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/033ace688eeed2751dc10905fe59dd92.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":1000,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":1542017,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/c3d18ae4be3634d899802c6a7cd42c14.png","itemName":"日本制造 夏日缤纷果味汽水 300毫升","positionRight":true,"top":370,"left":314,"price":12.9,"itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"一瓶汽水，开启盛夏美好时光","tagName":"日本制造 夏日缤纷果味汽水 300毫升","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/033ace688eeed2751dc10905fe59dd92.jpg","height":750}

lookList.content: 还是挺饱腹的，口感还可以，里面有朱古力饼干脆。
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/f23d204f9e93170bb4fe993db90da131.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":1000,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":1527004,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/9298a0ca433111df3591b3b8a686d9b4.png","itemName":"韩国制造 乳清蛋白代餐粉（可可味）60克","positionRight":true,"top":586,"left":394,"price":29,"itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"低卡持久饱腹 便携冷水即冲","tagName":"韩国制造 乳清蛋白代餐粉（可可味）60克","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/f23d204f9e93170bb4fe993db90da131.jpg","height":998}

lookList.content: 月饼造型很美，但好吃程度不及美观度，茶叶很香，还算满意
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/bd97d2185e4476620a333195cc5c5411.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":1824,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":1667009,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/5a0f7026023c805e80c32578a1efad4b.png","itemName":"仲秋·拾月 茗月夜月饼礼盒 60克*8枚","positionRight":true,"top":268,"left":396,"price":198,"itemStatus":0,"position":2,"itemDesc":"咸甜搭配，缤纷果味","tagName":"仲秋·拾月 茗月夜月饼礼盒 60克*8枚","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/bd97d2185e4476620a333195cc5c5411.jpg","height":912}

lookList.content: 吃过的饱腹感最持久的代餐粉，味道也很好，用牛奶冲的
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/266017f9e953bbd326a3e74e68fc0075.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":750,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":1527004,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/9298a0ca433111df3591b3b8a686d9b4.png","itemName":"韩国制造 乳清蛋白代餐粉（可可味）","positionRight":true,"top":748,"left":394,"price":25,"itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"低卡持久饱腹 便携冷水即冲","tagName":"韩国制造 乳清蛋白代餐粉（可可味）","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/266017f9e953bbd326a3e74e68fc0075.jpg","height":1000}

lookList.content: 特别好吃！！松脆咸香，根本停不下来。跟我在日本吃到的一样，正宗！～每个口味都买了3包，开袋就吃光了。价格相对其他商家来说性价比很高了，比找在日本的朋友代购都划算。无限回购！～海苔的香和天妇罗的松脆，配茶泡饭也很合适。
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/091b86362ea3a5853a6a1ec519c94724.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":1000,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":1476002,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/6225ca9939943346aa4738c30babe63f.png","itemName":"日本制造 海苔格子薯片 45克","positionRight":true,"top":340,"left":410,"price":15.9,"itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"一整片海苔提鲜，口有余香","tagName":"日本制造 海苔格子薯片 45克","cart":true}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/091b86362ea3a5853a6a1ec519c94724.jpg","height":1000}

lookList.content: 上次买了一瓶尝了一下，满意。这次买六瓶装，可可为很浓，不过偏甜。口感浓稠，有可咀嚼的颗粒。喜欢这个味道。
lookList.tagInfo: {"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/ee71b291048ab4e84a003e4f8451531c.jpg","videoUrl":"","width":1088,"rank":0,"isVideo":false,"comment":[{"itemId":1527004,"picUrl":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/9298a0ca433111df3591b3b8a686d9b4.png","itemName":"韩国制造 乳清蛋白代餐粉（可可味）","positionRight":true,"top":400,"left":506,"price":29,"itemStatus":2,"position":2,"itemDesc":"低卡持久饱腹 便携冷水即冲","tagName":"韩国制造 乳清蛋白代餐粉（可可味）","cart":false}],"url":"https://yanxuan.nosdn.127.net/ee71b291048ab4e84a003e4f8451531c.jpg","height":816}
